scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.format: npm run format:target && npm run format:server && prettier '*.{js,json}' 'bin/*.js' 'test/*.{html,json,js,css}' --write
scripts.build: gulp clean && npm run build:target && npm run build:front_end
scripts.dev:front_end: cd devtools/devtools-frontend && gn gen out/Default && autoninja -C out/Default && lsla shx cp -R out/Default/gen/front_end ../../public
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:target
scripts.init:front_end: cd devtools && rm -rf devtools-frontend && gclient sync --with_branch_heads --verbose && cd ../ && python3 script/apply_all_patches.py patches/config.json
